Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring reports to the city council of any variance or special permit granted despite the community board’s recommendation of disapproval or approval with conditions.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring reports to the city council of any variance or special permit granted despite the community board’s recommendation of disapproval or approval with conditions.
